com.nkoiv.mists.game.world

Class MapGenerator.BSParea

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nkoiv.mists.game.world.MapGenerator.BSParea
  • Enclosing class:
    MapGenerator

    public class MapGenerator.BSParea
extends Object
    BSPareas are areas inside the map that house the rooms. Each area has a parent and (up to) two children. BSP maps are generated by splitting these areas further and further, until they're of the desired side. After that the rooms can be generated into them.

    • Method Detail

      • splitArea

        public boolean splitArea(float minSize,
                         float maxSize,
                         int absMin)
        Split this area into two children
        Parameters:
        minSize - Minimum size of a child (% of the area size)
        maxSize - Maximum size of a child (% of the area size)
        absMin - Absolute minimum size off a child, in tiles
        Returns:
        Return true if the area was split succesfully

      • generateRoom

        public void generateRoom(int minSize)
        Generate a room inside the area
        Parameters:
        minSize - Minimum size of the room, in tiles
